mapper.select: SELECT a.account_id accountId, case when s.student_name IS NOT NULL then s.student_name when t.teacher_name IS NOT NULL then t.teacher_name when m.manager_name IS NOT NULL then m.manager_name END accountName FROM account a LEFT JOIN student s ON a.account_id = s.student_id LEFT JOIN teacher t ON a.account_id = t.teacher_id LEFT JOIN manager m ON a.account_id = m.manager_id WHERE !( s.student_name IS NULL AND t.teacher_name IS NULL AND m.manager_name IS NULL ) AND ( s.student_name LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{searchAccount} , '%') OR t.teacher_name LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{searchAccount} , '%') OR m.manager_name LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{searchAccount} , '%') OR a.account_id LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{searchAccount} , '%') )
